post:
Hello,

We are a UK registered Ltd Company and have been offering webhosting and VPS plans since 2006 in the UK

We have revamped our Xen plans to offer more value for money. XEN-HV plans also available here https://www.onepoundwebhosting.co.uk/cart.php?gid=4

In the low end bracket:

XEN-PV-128
2 (CPU Cores)
8GB (Disk)
100GB (Bandwidth)
128MB (RAM)
256MB (Swap Disk)
1 x IPv4

£12 Semi Annually / £22.64 Annually
https://www.onepoundwebhosting.co.uk/cart.php?gid=8

XEN-PV-256
2 (CPU Cores)
16GB (Disk)
200GB (Bandwidth)
256MB (RAM)
512MB (Swap Disk)
1 x IPv4

£12 Quarterly / £22.68 Semi Annually / £42.84 Annually
https://www.onepoundwebhosting.co.uk/cart.php?gid=8

We also have our custom configurator still available, customize exactly to your requirements.

Base Spec:

96MB Ram
128MB Swap
2GB Disk Space
25GB Bandwidth
1 vCore
1 IPv4

£7 Semi-Annually / £12 Annually

You want more disk space, CPU, Ram etc not a problem choose from the drop down box and the price will adjust accordingly.
Direct Signup link for this deal https://www.onepoundwebhosting.co.uk/cart.php?a=add&pid=30


All equipment is owned by us, we have our own dedicated server racks within ServerHouse Datacentre along the South Coast of UK.

Our Typical Enterprise Grade Node:

Dual Quad Core Xeon CPU's
16-32GB EEC RAM
3ware Raid with battery backup
HotSwap Hard drive Caddies
4 x SATA or SAS Drives in Raid 10
Gigabit Nic's

200mb Test file http://www.onepoundwebhosting.co.uk/test/200MB.zip
TEST IP 195.49.147.100
All servers are unmanaged and come with 1 IP. Additional IP's available at £1 a month and justification.

We are currently being listed / tested on http://vpsperformance.com   here http://vpsperformance.com/company/10/


Thank you

Stuart
OnePoundWebHosting Ltd
